Based on the given image, design a modern food-themed poster. Keep a clear display of the burger in the center, and add floating food elements such as sesame seeds, cheese slices, lettuce leaves, and tomato slices around it to enhance the dynamic feel of the image. Use a gradient warm color tone (red and orange) for the background, incorporating soft light and glowing lines to create a warm, inviting atmosphere. Write "Savor the Flavor" at the top in bold letters. The overall style should be appetizing and fashionable, suitable for fast-food brand promotions or menu designs.

Design a modern food poster using the given image as the main focus. Keep the pizza clearly showcased in the center of the image, surrounded by floating elements like cheese strings, herb leaves, tomato sauce droplets, and chili slices to create a steaming, freshly-baked atmosphere. Use a bright orange-yellow gradient for the background, paired with soft light and heat wave visual effects to enhance the sense of appetite. Add a prominent, bold title at the top of the image: "Freshly Baked & Spicy". The overall style should be modern and enticing, suitable for promoting a new product at a pizza shop, as a main image on a menu, or for display on an online delivery platform.

Design a sports-tech style promotional poster using the given image as the main subject. Position the athletic shoes on the left or center of the composition. Use a refreshing gradient background (such as light gray to white, ice blue, or pale orange), and incorporate dynamic lines, speed light effects, and minimal geometric shapes to create a sense of lightness, dynamism, and futurism. Add virtual tracks or flow trail elements beneath the shoes to enhance the sense of movement. Include a main title in the upper right corner: "Light Start." The overall style should be simple and modern, suitable for promoting new sports brand products, as the main display of an online store, or for a spring-summer product launch.

Design a poster with the given object as the main subject, centered around the concept of "Green Living". Keep the apple in the center of the image, extending outward with elegant, ink-like green plant vines, morning dew, leaves swayed by the breeze, and natural texture patterns to create an atmosphere of "harmony between humans and nature". The background should feature a soft gradient transition between green and creamy white tones, resulting in a transparent and breathable effect. At the top of the image, use an elegant handwritten-style font to write: "An apple a day, mind and body at ease". The overall style should be gentle, environmentally friendly, and rich in lifestyle aesthetics, suitable for health food brands, ecological agriculture promotions, or green living advocacy posters.

Design a highly impactful summer refreshment-themed poster with this Coca-Cola can as the main subject. Retain a close-up view of the can in the center or slightly to the right of the image. The background should feature dynamic elements like splashing water, scattering ice cubes, and rising bubbles to create a visual burst of the drinking moment. Add travel agency details on the bottom left in clean sans-serif font to keep focus on the main visuals.

Create a stylish shoe advertisement poster centered on the given high heels. Place the heels prominently to showcase their sleek white texture and elegant curves. Add floating gold glitter, fine ink lines, or floral patterns around them to convey a sense of modern luxury. Use a light gray-to-white gradient background with soft lighting for a high-end, fresh look. Add the title 'Grace in Every Step' in bold gold uppercase font at the top center with slight shadow. Include the slogan 'Walk in elegance, step with confidence' below in clean sans-serif font. Ideal for high-end shoe promotions or boutique window displays.

Design a fashionable, tech-inspired promotional poster featuring the glasses. Position them slightly to the left with dazzling light effects to highlight the transparency and streamlined shape. Use a dark gradient background with abstract geometric patterns and subtle light lines to create a futuristic mood. On the right, add floating light dots and glowing streaks to enhance the trendy vibe. Use a bold sans-serif font for the headline 'Trend Leader' at the top center, with brand logo and a sharp slogan at the bottom. Ideal for product launches, online promotions, or retail displays targeting a fashion-forward audience.

Design an energetic and dynamic poster using the provided tennis racket and ball. Cross the rackets in the center for visual symmetry and place a tennis ball slightly lower to the right for motion. Add flying balls, speed lines, and glowing effects to evoke high-speed action. Use a blue-to-green gradient background resembling a tennis court with modern textures. Add a bold title 'Swing with Passion, Go All Out' at the top center. Perfect for promoting tennis clubs, sports events, or new athletic gear.

Design an elegant wedding-themed poster based on the provided image. Place the figure in a wedding dress slightly to the right of center, making it the visual focal point. Use a soft light green gradient background with petal overlays and lace patterns to create a dreamy and romantic feel. Add subtle glow effects to highlight dress details. Use a large, gold-accented handwritten-style title 'The Big Day' at the top center. Place additional information in clean font at the bottom. Ideal for wedding fairs, bridal shop displays, or event promotions.

Design a stylish and elegant product poster centered around the umbrella. Keep the floral pattern clear and add translucent raindrops and delicate petals around it to suggest a post-rain romantic scene. Use a soft pink-to-blue gradient background with abstract textures for depth. Add a flowing script-style title 'Strolling Among Flowers' at the bottom center. The design emphasizes beauty and innovation, perfect for mall showcases, brand promotions, or lifestyle e-commerce.

Design a festive promotional poster based on the provided red lantern image. Place the lantern at the center with golden willow decorations and scattered red petals to create a vibrant holiday feel. Use a red-to-gold gradient background with soft glow and sparkling effects to convey warmth and celebration. Add a bold golden headline 'Welcoming Spring Festival' at the top center, and a short festive slogan like 'Celebrate the New Year in Lights' in modern calligraphy at the bottom. A mix of traditional and modern styles, ideal for Chinese New Year events or online campaigns.

Design a sweet-themed fashion poster centered on the pink dress. Keep the dress prominent and surround it with floating petals, butterflies, and soft clouds to enhance the dreamy and romantic mood. Use a soft pink gradient background with faint halos for a gentle look. Add a handwritten-style headline at the top center: 'Fairy Girl's Favorite', and a slogan below: 'The perfect blend of elegance and sweetness'. Ideal for children's clothing promotions or pastel-style campaigns.

Create a promotional poster for honey products with the honeycomb and dipper as the main visuals. Place them at the center and highlight their rich texture and color. Use a gradient background from light yellow to gold to reflect warmth and natural quality. Add floating honey drops and flower petals to enhance sweetness and freshness. Include soft glow effects for a gentle ambiance. Title: 'Pure Natural Honey' in bold font at the top center. Add a concise description at the bottom to highlight the product's health benefits. Ideal for store displays, product launches, or online marketplaces.

Design a modern, tech-themed city travel poster featuring the Statue of Liberty. Center the statue to showcase its grandeur. Use a fresh blue-green gradient background with subtle grid patterns to convey a futuristic urban vibe. Add soft white stars in the top-right corner to symbolize hope. Use a bold sans-serif title 'Explore the Journey of Freedom' at the top center. Below, include a tagline like 'Feel the heartbeat and soul of New York' in lighter font. Ideal for tourism ads, airport billboards, or online travel platforms.

Design a high-energy extreme sports poster using the skateboarder image. Place the skater in mid-air near the upper center for strong visual impact. Use a deep blue gradient background with abstract motion lines and light effects to emphasize speed. Add city skyline shapes at the edges to blend urban culture with sports. Include skateboard parts and lightning icons for added excitement. Title like 'Dare to Leap' or 'Extreme Challenge' in large yellow bold font at the top. Add a short call-to-action at the bottom like 'Join the challenge, unleash your passion'. Perfect for brand campaigns or extreme sports events.

Design a luxurious-themed promotional poster based on the crown image. Place the crown centrally to highlight its ornate design and gemstones. Use a gradient background of deep blue and gold with abstract halos and star effects to evoke grandeur. Add soft glow bands above and below for depth. Title: 'Crowned in Glory' in gold 3D-style font at the top center, with a slogan like 'Experience the Luxury Life' in white below. Suitable for high-end jewelry promotions, brand ads, or event backdrops.

Create an art workshop promotional poster with the paintbrush image. Place the hand holding the brush in the bottom-left corner, highlighting the texture and detail. Use a soft beige gradient background inspired by handmade paper for a warm, natural feel. Add colorful brushstrokes and splatter effects to symbolize creative energy. At the top center, place the bold title 'Creative Painting Workshop' in dark contrasting color. Add workshop details in smaller clean font at the bottom right. Ideal for art events, studio promotions, or festival advertising.

Design a traditional culture-themed poster using the 'Fu' paper cutting. Center the character to emphasize its festive and peaceful vibe. Surround it with ribbons, lanterns, and plum blossoms for a lively Chinese New Year atmosphere. Use a warm red-to-gold gradient background with water-like textures for richness. Add a bold golden title 'A Home Full of Blessings' at the top. Ideal for holiday mall displays, online campaigns, or community event promotions.

Design a public donation campaign poster with the person in the image slightly right of center. Ensure they look directly at viewers for emotional connection. Add floating heart symbols, hand-in-hand icons, and Earth graphics to represent love and help. Use a soft blue-green gradient background to convey hope and warmth. Add a bold title 'Give Your Love' in warm tones like orange-red or gold at the top. Below, a simple call to action like 'Join the donation, change a life' in clear font. Ideal for charity event backdrops, community posters, or online fundraisers.

Create a cheerful and lively event poster with the provided photo. Center the person wearing a paper crown to highlight their joyful expression. Add confetti, balloons, and fireworks for a festive vibe. Use a rainbow gradient background with soft cloud textures to evoke fun and positivity. Include radiant light effects from behind the figure. Title: 'Joyful Moments, Celebrate This Summer!' in large modern sans-serif font at the top. Below, a smaller tagline: 'Join our party and enjoy the fun'. Ideal for community events, store openings, or social media campaigns targeting youth.
